response.overview: On December 08, 2017, in Hiroshima, Japan, NJPW World Tag League 2017 - Day 17 took place at the Hiroshima Green Arena Small Arena. The event was broadcast on NJPWWorld.com.  The main event featured EVIL and SANADA vs Hirooki Goto and YOSHI-HASHI. Juice Robinson and Sami Callihan also headlined, taking on BULLET CLUB's Hangman Page and Yujiro Takahashi.  Other wrestlers on the show include Tomohiro Ishii, Kazuchika Okada, and Hiromu Takahashi.
response.title: NJPW World Tag League 2017 - Day 17
